titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation commanding popish recusants to repair to their own dwellings, and not afterwards to come to court, or within ten miles of London, without speciall licence: and for disarming of them, as the law requireth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at the court at Whitehall the eleventh day of November, in the sixteenth yeer of His Majesties reign.
Steele notation: Arms 23; extraordinary of His.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majestie: and
